writer.name: 斯图尔特·哈泽尔丁 Stuart Hazeldine

director.name: 斯图尔特·哈泽尔丁 Stuart Hazeldine

introduction: A fourteen year-old boy named Christian arrives for his first day at a new school. His classmates sense there is something different about him, but no-one can explain why. Maria, the girl everyone picks on, warms to Christian’s friendship. The class bullies, led by Pullen, feel threatened by the attention he’s getting. Tension mounts as the day progresses… and something has to give before the final bell.
